name: Inspector (Silverjay Studio)
description:
*For the WebGL build, please ENABLE FULLSCREEN on itch to play. Otherwise the aspect ratio is not set properly.

Introduction:

Inspector is a 2D puzzle game where players answer questions and manipulate scenes to clear levels.

The main feature of the game is the "chatting system" where players can type texts to chat with the computer in order to get information and make some commands to change the scene.

Arrow Keys to move.

Ctrl Key to interact.

Left Click the text box to type using the keyboard.
